ourHistory.title: Our History
ourHistory.description: Since its creation in 2009, SOFIMED has first established itself as a supplier of technical products and high-quality turnkey solutions to industrialists, system integrators, and installers through a constant growth policy and expertise in partnership with leading manufacturers in the fluid transfer and dosing market, mechanical sealing, automation components, industrial connectivity, industrial filtration, compressors and compressed air treatment...

organization.title: Our organization
organization.description1: SOFIMED has developed by providing its industrial clients with solutions and technical recommendations that meet their needs.
organization.description2: This professionalism of our employees who benefit from ongoing technical training and the trust of our clients for over 20 years, allows us to be a recognized company in the market.

mission.title: Our mission
mission.description: The client is at the heart of our concern, SOFIMED is at their disposal to serve them like no one else can by offering a wide range of high-performance products and services (Product selection advice, Proximity service, Design, Manufacturing, Construction, Installation of custom solutions).

vision.title: Our vision
vision.description: To be a leader in technical industrial supply and Industrial Services by offering solutions and products to help companies save time and money during maintenance, repair, renovation of production lines and operation of their facilities.

servicesAndSolutions.title: Our services & solutions
servicesAndSolutions.description: At the SOFIMED group we have a wide range of services and solutions adapted to your industrial needs offering the highest quality, attention and reliability. Our team of product selection and associated suppliers know how to position themselves, offering growing value to our clients and contributing to improving their productivity.

advantages.title: Our advantages
advantages.description: We strive daily to maintain a close relationship based on mutual trust and understanding with our clients to better meet their expectations and honor our commitments through fast and quality service.

timeGain.title: Time savings, one supplier for multiple markets

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Quickly find answers to your questions

delivery.question: What are your delivery times?
delivery.answer: Our delivery times vary depending on products and your location. Generally, allow 2-5 business days for products in stock.

maintenance.question: Do you offer maintenance services?
maintenance.answer: Yes, we offer preventive and corrective maintenance contracts for all our equipment.

quote.question: How to get a personalized quote?
quote.answer: You can contact us via this form, by phone or email. We will respond within 24 hours with a detailed quote.

individuals.question: Do you work with individuals?
individuals.answer: SOFIMED focuses primarily on the B2B market, but we can consider certain individual requests on a case-by-case basis.

hero.title: Services
hero.subtitle: Get information and skills to improve your operations

services.intro: At the SOFIMED group, we have a wide range of services adapted to your industrial needs offering the highest quality, attention and reliability. Our team of product managers and associated suppliers constantly innovates, offering constant value to our customers and helping to improve their productivity.

customerRelations.title: Customer Relations Center
customerRelations.description: Over the years, the SOFIMED team has built solid experience in the distribution of medical equipment and in the maintenance of medical equipment.

technicalSupport.title: Technical Support S.A.V
technicalSupport.description: We have established technical partnerships with several medical equipment manufacturers and we have acquired expertise in maintenance.

professionalTraining.title: Professional Training
professionalTraining.description: A team of professionals trains you on the use of your medical equipment for better handling and optimal use.

designModeling.title: Design & Plan Modeling
designModeling.description: We offer design and 3D modeling services for your industrial projects, with advanced technical expertise.

designEngineering.title: Design Engineering
designEngineering.description: Our team of engineers supports you in the design and development of innovative technical solutions adapted to your needs.

completeOffer.title: Our Complete Offer
completeOffer.description: At the SOFIMED group, we have a wide range of services adapted to your industrial needs offering the highest quality, attention and reliability. Our team of product managers and associated suppliers constantly innovates, offering constant value to our customers and helping to improve their productivity.

consulting.title: Consulting
consulting.description: Our highly qualified back-office staff, trained in your trades, advises you on the choice of equipment and components you need.

proximityService.title: Proximity Service
proximityService.description: Our traveling sales team of technical-commercial engineers is at your disposal every day to help you make the best choice of products for your needs.

design3D.title: 3D Plan Design
design3D.description: This service allows immediate visualization of installation and access to equipment. Space is better managed, assembly optimized.

logistics.title: Logistics
logistics.description: A large stock on the central logistics platform in Casablanca industrial district and point of sale in Casa and Tangier for fast delivery in partnership with national and international transport companies.

qualityCommitment.title: Quality Commitment
qualityCommitment.description: Our Quality commitment allows complete adequacy of our products and services to customer needs. SOFIMED is certified ISO 9001/ ISO 14001/OHSAS 18001 and many other specific ATEX certificates...

engineeringService.title: Engineering Service
engineeringService.description: This service carries out pre-project studies to verify feasibility and then define the solutions best suited to your needs taking into consideration your constraints, budget and schedule.

maintenance.title: Maintenance & Preparation
maintenance.description: SOFIMED offers you all maintenance and repair operations on its products in the workshop or in your premises.

commissioning.title: Commissioning
commissioning.description: A team of technicians is at your disposal for assistance with installation, commissioning, repair but also for optimization.

training.title: Training
training.description: SOFIMED provides product training for equipment and installation maintenance on site or in our premises.

solutions.title: Our Solutions
solutions.subtitle: To ensure production reliability and optimize costs, the SOFIMED group offers its industrial clients specific solutions for the installation and maintenance of their equipment.

hero.title: Our Solutions
hero.subtitle: Innovative and customized solutions to meet all your industrial challenges

distribution.title: Sofimed Distribution
distribution.description: The Sofimed group offers different types of offers: commercial offers with equipment and associated supplies that constantly innovate, providing constant value to our customers and helping to improve their productivity. Our product manager teams and associated suppliers constantly innovate, providing constant value to our customers and helping to improve their productivity.

automation.title: Automation
automation.description: Our automation solutions optimize your industrial processes through cutting-edge technologies. We offer intelligent systems that improve efficiency and reduce operational costs.

quality.title: Quality
quality.description: Our quality commitment is recognized by ISO 9001 certification. This certification attests to our ability to provide products and services that comply with our customers' requirements and applicable regulations, while demonstrating our continuous improvement.

waterPressure.title: Water Pressure Boosting Skids
waterPressure.content: We design and manufacture water pressure boosting systems with high flow rates and pressure requirements according to standards for industrial applications. These designs and manufactures are delivered as complete assemblies (pressure switches, gauges, valves, etc.) with vertical or horizontal centrifugal electric pumps in stainless steel or cast iron equipped with frequency drives, management and control automation, group inlet-outlet manifolds, pressure tank, protection and control card and all accessories mounted on the chassis. You will always find a solution with our SOFIMED team that meets your needs.

gplPumping.title: LPG Pumping & Compression Skids
gplPumping.content:
We provide a complete range of LPG and liquefied gas pumping and compression units designed and manufactured in our workshops in Casablanca according to current standards with the integration of vertical compressors, vane pumps, side channel multicellular pumps, electric motor, liquid-trap, four-way valve, piping, electrical control or power cabinet and many other control and safety equipment and instruments (pressure, level, temperature...) for tank truck unloading/loading and LPG gas bottle filling.

Our technical service studies and proposes specific pumping and compression units for special applications at the customer's request in compliance with current regulatory standards.

dosing.title: Pumping, Dosing & Metering Skids
dosing.content: We carefully build transfer, dosing, additive injection or specific fluid metering skids with a configuration well adapted to customer requirements and safety standards. Our skids are tested in our workshops before delivery and installation.

technicalAssistance.title: Technical Assistance and Maintenance
technicalAssistance.description: SOFIMED offers its customers various telephone technical assistance programs, corrective and preventive maintenance, periodic equipment checks and ensures all on-site troubleshooting, workshop overhaul or maintenance contracts.

projectManagement.title: Project Management
projectManagement.description: A team of experts in Fluid Mechanics, Electrical Studies, Automation, Instrumentation, Structural and Piping Studies develop training materials for our internal teams and clients.
